title: 外國駐港記者唔洗訓凌晨兩三點出片講光復元朗727

replies.msg:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kwIVQFAQpmE

呢個Channel就咁睇係勁多勁多英國新聞, 受眾應該都係英國觀眾多. 家陣最影片指明元朗721暴力事件而引發起727光復元朗. 佢地用字都好正, riot police(暴警), brazen act(厚顏無恥的行為)


另外就係, 我睇條片後面先發現「原來係呢個記者!!」. 個記者係同「我朋友」同一班車去紅磡方向. 當手足落車果陣同D示威者講 SUN FU SAI

replies.msg:
Chinese government involves in terrorism in Hong Kong
HK: Right outside of Nam Pin Wai, where the attackers retreated to after the terrorist attack on 21/7, a car (car number TP8431) was discovered on 26/7, alongside a Chinese Liberation Army hat, rattan canes(commonly used by attackers on 21/7), a katana and other weapons. An electricity bill of “Yip Foo” (葉虎) with registered address in Nam Pin Wai was also discovered. The name is shared by a senior official of Chinese Liaison office responsible for the region, suggesting China’s involvement in the terrorist attack on 21/7.
